title: Unable to connect to game
body:
Hey there everyone,

I just wanted to play my last game before promos to gold 5 in flex queue, but when the loading screen should have appeared,
 the client said he wasnt getting an internet connection (I checked with youtube, I had Internet). 
Even after closing my client completely several times I could not reconnect to the game and after a few minutes of trying getting back into the game, 
I saw the after-game screen: remake and 16 lp loss for me. Is there a way to get that back since in was clearly not my faul but the clients?
and is riot aware of that client-issue? It's just so tilting to lose a game like this...

thanks.

replies.body:
We can't adjust LP or ranked stats.  :(  What I can do, though, is help troubleshoot this to prevent it from happening again.  Even though you can use the net or Youtube, it seems clear that your connection is really struggling to specifically stick to our game server.  

I recommend sticking to custom games for now so you don't lose from a d/c again, and go over each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The steps there should tune up your network and stay in game!
